name: DELAY OF THE DEATH
description:
Game created for Ludum Dare 50, with the theme “Delay the Inevitable”.

You will not be able to prevent aging (inevitable), but you can delay it by collecting beneficial items (delaying).

Take the journey of life in this game inspired by the video “Happiness” and “Rat Race”.

How to play

Just press the left mouse button or the spacebar to jump.

Developers:
  • Danilo Filitto (Developer)
  • Jonathan Volpi (game design and artist)
  • Kevin Sousa Santos (Music and Sound)
